SEARCH
Package com.example.vortex_app.model

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.vortex_app.model.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
UserRepository handles all user-related data operations, including retrieving, saving, and updating user data in Firestore, as well as uploading and deleting avatar images in Firebase Storage.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    UserRepository.OnAvatarDeletedCallback
    Callback interface for when an avatar image is deleted from Firebase Storage.
    static interface 
    UserRepository.OnAvatarUploadedCallback
    Callback interface for when an avatar image is uploaded to Firebase Storage.
    static interface 
    UserRepository.OnUserLoadedCallback
    Callback interface for when a user is loaded from Firestore.
    static interface 
    UserRepository.OnUserSavedCallback
    Callback interface for when a user is saved to Firestore.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserRepository()
    Constructor initializes the Firestore and Firebase Storage instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserRepository

      public UserRepository()
      Constructor initializes the Firestore and Firebase Storage instances.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String androidId, UserRepository.OnUserLoadedCallback callback)
      Retrieves a user document from Firestore based on the provided Android ID.
      Parameters:
      androidId - The unique identifier for the user's device.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • saveUser

      public void saveUser(String androidId, User user, UserRepository.OnUserSavedCallback callback)
      Saves or updates a user document in Firestore with the provided user data.
      Parameters:
      androidId - The unique identifier for the user's device.
      user - The User object containing user data to be saved.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • uploadAvatar

      public void uploadAvatar(String androidId, android.net.Uri imageUri, String oldAvatarUrl, UserRepository.OnAvatarUploadedCallback callback)
      Uploads a new avatar image to Firebase Storage and updates the user's avatar URL in Firestore. If an old avatar exists, it deletes the old avatar from storage.
      Parameters:
      androidId - The unique identifier for the user's device.
      imageUri - The URI of the new avatar image to upload.
      oldAvatarUrl - The URL of the old avatar image to delete (if any).
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • deleteAvatar

      public void deleteAvatar(String androidId, String oldAvatarUrl, UserRepository.OnAvatarDeletedCallback callback)
      Deletes the user's avatar image from Firebase Storage and removes the avatar URL from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      androidId - The unique identifier for the user's device.
      oldAvatarUrl - The URL of the avatar image to delete (if any).
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • initializeUserData

      public void initializeUserData(String androidId, UserRepository.OnUserSavedCallback callback)
      Initializes default user data in Firestore when a new user is detected.
      Parameters:
      androidId - The unique identifier for the user's device.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.
